text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.title: MounderTweaks Configuration
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.com: Poisonous potato composting
Enable composting of poisonous potatoes
Shovel Grinding
Enable grinding of cobblestone to gravel and gravel to sand by right-clicking with a shovel
Explosive fuel
Enable use of gunpowder as a furnace fuel
Fiery fuel
Enable use of blaze powder as a furnace fuel
Glass generators
Enable conversion of Sand to Glass when touching lava
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.cli: Enable the enchantment glint rendering on potions
text.autoconfig.moundertweaks.option.com: Sheep Color Weights
Enable colored sheep spawning
